thread.title: Big B turns down invitation by Queen Elizabeth II
thread.title_full: Big B turns down invitation by Queen Elizabeth II

author: Koimoi.Com Team
title: Big B turns down invitation by Queen Elizabeth II
text: tweet Amitabh Bachchan will not be able to attend the reception of UK-India Year of Culture, a “rare invitation” of which was sent to the megastar by Queen Elizabeth II and the Duke of Edinburgh. Amitabh was invited by the royals for a special reception to launch the UK-India Year of Culture later this month. Big B turns down invitation by Queen Elizabeth II His publicist said in a statement: “Yes, Mr Bachchan has been given a rare invitation by Queen Elizabeth and Buckingham Palace to grace the UK-India Year Of Culture reception, but unfortunately due to prior commitments, he will be unable to attend.” Currently, the actor is gearing up for the launch of “ Sarkar 3 ” trailer, scheduled for the first week of March. His upcoming projects include Ayan Mukerji’s tentatively titled “ Dragon “, Kabir Khan’s production, “ Thugs Of Hindostan ” and “ Aankhen 2 “. TAGS
